plays.text: Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Interference Denis Hamel
Penalty to Jason Woolley 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Kris Draper
Penalty to Rhett Warrener 2 minutes for Tripping Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Rhett Warrener 2 minutes for Holding Pavel Datsyuk
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Tripping DMITRI KALININ
Goal scored by Stu Barnes assisted by Tim Connolly and Miroslav Satan
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by DMITRI KALININ and Tim Connolly
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Crosschecking Miroslav Satan
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Darren McCarty 2 minutes for Tripping Maxim Afinogenov
Penalty to Alexei Zhitnik 2 minutes for Slashing Sergei Fedorov
Goal scored by Fredrik Olausson assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Sergei Fedorov
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Tripping Vyacheslav Kozlov
Penalty to Vaclav Varada 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jiri Fischer
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Chris Gratton
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Chris Chelios
